# TC06 - cancel within cancellation deadline (1 room)

## Step 02: block (getrooms_block)

### API Request
**Endpoint:** `POST /api/flows/block`  
**Headers:**  
- `Authorization: Bearer ***`

```json
{"flowId":"9b8e9aea-7d0f-4f39-bd38-c60a01bf8108","offerToken":".vXRoUCoM-ZfAuiDJIE8Pa26lQXS_2LQeEeAZkxfAG-w"}
```
